body_html: I had this problem just earlier today and I was implementing an RNN as well. it went away when i properly detatched my hidden states using h = h.detach() ; c = c.detach(). The model was backpropagating the hidden state further than it should and it was causing massive memory usage. Not sure if thats your problem but I cant see detach or .'repackage_hidden' in your code so that could be it.
